name: A. Insert Digit
statement:
You have a number of length n and one additional digit.You can insert
this digit anywhere in the number, including at the beginning or at the
end.Your task is to make the result as large as possible.For example,
you have the number 76543, and the additional digit is 4. Then the
maximum number you can get is 765443, and it can be obtained in two ways
by inserting a digit after the 3th or after the 4th digit of the number.
